titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to allow for the deferral or disallowance of portions of payments for certain managed care violations under Medicaid.
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to allow for the deferral or disallowance of portions of payments for certain managed care violations under Medicaid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
